description: Output Control Package - Controls the output of head, drawdown, and budget data from a MODFLOW simulation

variables.name: COMMENT
variables.description: Optional comment lines at beginning of file.
variables.tooltip: Lines starting with '#' are treated as comments and ignored by MODFLOW.

datasets.description: Output file format and unit numbers (words method)

variables.name: IHEDFM
variables.description: Format code for printing heads. 0=10G11.4, positive=fixed format, negative=free format with specified width.
variables.tooltip: Controls the Fortran format used when heads are printed to the listing file. Only applies to printed (text) output, not binary.

variables.name: IDDNFM
variables.description: Format code for printing drawdowns. Same codes as IHEDFM.
variables.tooltip: Controls the Fortran format used when drawdowns are printed to the listing file.

variables.name: IHEDUN
variables.description: Unit number for saving head output. 0=no head saved to file.
variables.tooltip: Fortran unit number for the binary head output file (.hds). Must match the unit assigned to the head file.

variables.name: IDDNUN
variables.description: Unit number for saving drawdown output. 0=no drawdown saved to file.
variables.tooltip: Fortran unit number for the binary drawdown output file. Must match the unit assigned to the drawdown file.

variables.name: COMPACT_BUDGET
variables.description: Keyword indicating compact budget output format. Recommended for all new models.
variables.tooltip: Writes cell-by-cell budget files in compact form (list format for boundary packages). Saves disk space and is required by some post-processors.

datasets.description: Stress period output control (numeric method - legacy)

variables.name: INCODE
variables.description: Output code. <0=same as previous period, 0=output controlled by subsequent values.
variables.tooltip: If < 0, output control from previous period is reused. If 0, output flags are read for this period.

variables.name: IHDDFL
variables.description: Head/drawdown output flag for each time step. 0=no output, nonzero=output.
variables.tooltip: If nonzero, heads and drawdowns are printed/saved according to IHEDFM/IDDNFM settings.

variables.name: IBUDFL
variables.description: Budget print flag. 0=no print, nonzero=print budget summary.
variables.tooltip: If nonzero, the volumetric budget summary is printed to the listing file.

variables.name: ICBCFL
variables.description: Cell-by-cell flow flag. 0=no output, nonzero=save cell-by-cell flows.
variables.tooltip: If nonzero, cell-by-cell flow terms are saved to the budget file for packages that have their save flag set.

variables.name: PERIOD
variables.description: Keyword 'PERIOD' followed by stress period number to start a new period block.
variables.tooltip: Begins output control for a specific stress period. Format: PERIOD iperoc

variables.name: STEP
variables.description: Keyword 'STEP' followed by time step number within the period.
variables.tooltip: Specifies the time step for which output actions apply. Format: STEP itsoc

variables.name: SAVE_HEAD
variables.description: Save head values to binary output file.
variables.tooltip: Writes head arrays to the binary head file at the specified time step.

variables.name: SAVE_DRAWDOWN
variables.description: Save drawdown values to binary output file.
variables.tooltip: Writes drawdown arrays to the binary drawdown file at the specified time step.

variables.name: SAVE_BUDGET
variables.description: Save cell-by-cell budget terms to binary output file.
variables.tooltip: Writes cell-by-cell flow terms to the binary budget file (.cbc) at the specified time step.

variables.name: PRINT_HEAD
variables.description: Print head values to the listing file.
variables.tooltip: Prints head arrays to the listing file using the format specified by IHEDFM.

variables.name: PRINT_DRAWDOWN
variables.description: Print drawdown values to the listing file.
variables.tooltip: Prints drawdown arrays to the listing file using the format specified by IDDNFM.

variables.name: PRINT_BUDGET
variables.description: Print volumetric budget summary to the listing file.
variables.tooltip: Prints the overall volumetric budget summary to the listing file.
